channel.title: Research Interests on Florian Pfisterer
channel.description: Recent content in Research Interests on Florian Pfisterer

item.description: Research Interests (Future) In the future, I would like to explore several direction at the intersection of Algorithmic Fairness and AutoML. If you are interested in collaborating, get in contact! Previous Work Throughout my PhD I conducted research on several topics with the overarching goal to robustify, simplify and improve machine learning for non-expert users. This website only shows a selected subset of my work, please refer to my google scholar profile for an up-to-date and more comprehensive overview.
